mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hapumdb.program ( title, content, start_date, end_date, location, target, capacity, thumbnail_src, create_on, update_on, expense, subject, open_status, add_id, need_org_name, need_part_count, need_relation ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{location}, #{target}, #{capacity}, #{thumbnailSrc}, NOW(), NOW(), #{expense}, #{subject}, 'Y', #{addId}, #{needOrgName}, #{needPartCount}, #{needRelation} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM hapumdb.program ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT SUM(part_count) FROM hapumdb.program_subs WHERE program_id =#{programId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hapumdb.program_subs (user_id, program_id, subs_on, is_app, part_count, relation, org_name) VALUES (#{userId}, #{programId}, NOW(), 'N', #{partCount}, #{relation}, #{orgName})
mapper.select: SELECT ps.id AS program_sub_id, ps.program_id, ps.user_id, ps.is_app, u.id AS user_id, u.name, u.phone, u.email FROM hapumdb.program_subs ps JOIN hapumdb.user u ON ps.user_id = u.id WHERE ps.program_id = #{programId}

SELECT p.id, p.title, p.content, p.subject, p.start_date AS startDate, p.end_date AS endDate, p.location, p.target, p.capacity, p.expense, p.thumbnail_src AS thumbnailSrc, p.create_on AS createOn, p.update_on AS updateOn, ps.id AS subsId, ps.subs_on AS subsOn, ps.is_app AS isApp FROM hapumdb.program p INNER JOIN hapumdb.program_subs ps ON p.id = ps.program_id WHERE ps.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE hapumdb.program SET open_status=#{code} where id=#{programId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM hapumdb.program WHERE start_date BETWEEN CURDATE() AND DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)
SELECT * FROM hapumdb.program WHERE start_date BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY start_date
